article.title: ATK Receives $9.7 Million Follow-On Contract for M228 Practice Grenade Fuzes
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Alliant Techsystems (ATK) has received a follow-on production contract valued at $9.7 million for M228 practice grenade fuzes. If all options are exercised, the total value of the contract would be worth approximately $50 million.
